attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
God forgive us for our lack of basic humanity and compassion. What happen to helping those in the developing countries? 
We can't deport terrorist or murderous criminals because of their human rights, spending more money and resources looking after them but can removed this lady to have a painful slow death.
Yes, the NHS is under funded and not working well for the people of England but this is a very special case but to remove a terminally ill woman who has cancer and requires kidney dialysis is very heartless this day and age. I am against people breaking our laws and abusing the system but what happen to a little bit of dignity.
Mr. Brown please do something and don't let her suffer in silence

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
